mapper.select: SELECT DM.DOCUMENT_NUM AS dmNum, DM.DOCUMENT_TITLE AS dmTitle, DM.APPROVAL_CODE AS apCode, DM.DOCUMENT_CODE AS dmCode, MM.ID AS dmWriteId, MM.NAME AS dmWriter, DM.DOCUMENT_DATE AS dmDate FROM DM INNER JOIN MM ON DM.WRITER = MM.ID AND DM.COMPANY_CODE = MM.COMPANY_CODE WHERE DM.COMPANY_CODE=#{cmCode} AND DM.APPROVAL_CODE=#{apCode} ORDER BY DM.document_date DESC
